content: Treat every sports fan sitting behind you to a sight for sore eyes when you’re sitting on the tramp stamp bleacher seat. This comical foam seat will turn those cold and rigid steel bleachers into a comfortable seat that screams out that your ass is classy.

Keep your buzz going while on the go with the collapsible shot flask. The collapsible shot flask features a metallic collapsible shot cup that fits into the side of the flask, so you can enjoy a nice and easy to swallow pick me up at any time during the day.

If you struggle to create magic in the kitchen, the cooking apron cheat sheet is just the thing you need to salvage your laughably poor cooking skills. The apron comes printed with cooking guidelines and helpful tips to make you a better chef.

Take out your targets with deadly precision with this hidden blade gauntlet. Styled in the likeness of the iconic weapon seen in the Assassin’s Creed series – this replica toy blade uses a spring loaded retractable blade when you’re ready to make your move.

Learn about the vast cosmos like any self respecting Star Wars fan would with the Darth Vader home planetarium. Vader’s iconic black helmets sits ominously until the moment where a small hole at the top opens up to display the incredible sight of the Milky Way.

Tony Stark’s about to make a crash landing in your house with the Iron Man 3D hand nightlight. It’s functional art at its finest – the nightlight creates the illusion the hand is bursting through the wall in order to provide some relief from the dark.

Have a laugh while you spend some time reading the Alphabet of Terrible Advice book to the kids. This hilarious book is filled with vividly illustrated scenes where goofy looking anthropomorphized characters guide you down a path of poor decision making.

Unleash your imagination unto the street and sidewalk with the crayola glitter sidewalk chalk. These sparkly crayons come in every color of the rainbow and offer an easy and fun way for kids to create amazing works of art that can be erased with a quick hose down wash.

Make sure your pooch stays in top shape with the dog treadmill. The dog treadmill is specially designed for canines to get the exercise they need at a comfortable pace. It’s perfect for dog owners with busy schedules or a small backyard.

One look at the tipsy wine glasses and it’s obvious that you aren’t the only one who enjoys the effects of adult grape juice. This set of whimsical stemware is perfect for adding a fun and light touch to any formal and stuffy occasion – bottoms up!

Liven up your morning showers by blaring some of your favorite music on the waterproof bluetooth speaker. This versatile speaker is compact, floats, and is entirely waterproof – making it the ultimate way to listen to tunes while at the beach or pool.

Impeccable style doesn’t just happen, it’s something that has to learned from the ABC’s Of Men’s Fashion book. Written by highly esteemed fashion experts, this encyclopedia of style teaches you the ins and outs of men’s fashion so you’re always dressed like a sir.

Half man half mug – the RoboCop coffee cup is here to serve the public – their hot beverages. Forged from flesh, steel, and ceramic, the RoboCop themed coffee cup is designed to look identical to the human-cyborg who fights to uphold the law for the greater good.

Enjoy the perks of having the all powerful bionic arm you’ve always dreamed of with the inflatable minigun arm. Once inflated, it converts your useless human arm into a devastatingly lethal minigun you can use to hit friends and siblings over the head.

Make cleaning day a little easier on yourself by enlisting the help from the robotic floor cleaning mop ball. This small roving ball comes lined with a soft polyester mop that won’t scratch the floor and includes a timer so you can let it run free throughout the home.

Shatter your town’s downhill record by whizzing down the tallest hill on the rocket sled. Made with serious sledders in mind, it boasts specially designed kneepads, a sturdy plastic frame, and a padded seatbelt strap so you can catch big air without falling off.

Guarantee your night ends with a bang by complementing your dapper outfit with a few sprays of the Sure Fuck cologne. Apart from the intrigue and lure the cologne’s risque name attracts, it carries a fresh, clean, and manly scent no one will be able to resist.

Hear ye, hear ye, the courageous and noble medieval knight egg holder has returned from his noble quest and is here to lend a helping <del>hand</del> spoon. Styled like a brave medieval knight, the holder keeps your boiled egg safe until you peel back its shining armor and dig in.

Transform any tub, sink, or bowl in your home into a calming koi pond with the color changing koi fish toy. These realistic looking koi fish float at the water’s surface and glow in a variety of magnificent hues the moment they come into contact with water.

Confirm you’re living in the real world by using your very own Inception totem to test if you’re stuck in a dream. The totem is made from zinc alloy silver and comes perfectly balanced so you can spin it with ease upon waking up from a nice long nap.

With the camouflage condoms on the job, you can rest easy and relish in the moment as your private invades another private. These trusted condoms are made with an army inspired motif that camouflages your little soldier so they’ll never see him coming.

Nighttime is about to get a lot brighter when the light up teddy bear moves in. This cuddly creature lights up as soon as you embrace it and automatically turns off after ten minutes of inactivity, making this the perfect night light for anyone who fears the dark.

Warm beer sucks. So get your beer cooler than a polar bear’s toe nail with the beer spinning chilling tool. This innovative device spins the can at high speeds and uses convection to rapidly cool down your disgusting warm beer in under a minute.

Yaarrrr, now with the pirate peg leg corkscrew you’ll be able to pop open your favorite wines or eighteenth century rum bottles like a pro. This miniature pirate is always willing to lend a hand – or in this case his corkscrew peg leg – to facilitate your inebriation.

Turn any watering hole into an instant oasis with the floating aquatic table. This all inclusive structure comfortably sits up to four people and provides a sturdy table great for hosting aquatic picnics or playing drinking games while relaxing in the water.

Turn your favorite lighter into an all purpose pocket knife with the lighter multi-tool. This handy attachment is the ultimate upgrade for any lighter. It goes on in a snap and features a plethora of handy tools including a knife, screwdriver, and bottle opener.

Listen to some good tunes while you sprawl out on this high tech speaker blanket. This modern age picnic blanket is waterproof and uses AA batteries to power its convenient built-in speaker system that can be hooked up to your smartphone or media playing device.

Injustice isn’t only found on dry land – that’s why the Iron Man aquarium ornament has arrived to restore order to your chaotic fish tank. Iron Man stands vigilantly, watching over all the inhabitants of the aquarium to make sure they stay out of harms way.

Unleash the fury of the water dragon faucet and watch even the toughest of dirt and scum succumb to its high pressured wrath. This mystical and sleek dragon comes available in various elegant antique finishes so it looks great in either any type of decorum.

Command a whopping 50,000 volts of power with this compact tesla coil. The tesla coil works great for performing dangerous science experiments and class presentations. The coil even generates enough high frequency energy to light up fluorescent tubes from 2 feet away.

That horse mask of yours isn’t fooling anyone – at least not without the human horse hooves to complete the disguise. These 14″ latex hooves look remarkably real and slip on like gloves and can be removed quickly when you need to use your inferior human hands.

Are those pesky negative vibrations from ectoplasmic entities driving you mad? Fight back with a positive blast from the Ghostbusters themed neutrino wand! The wand delivers vibrations, LED animations, and sounds from the movie for a truly authentic feel.

Keep your four legged friend visibly safe on those night time walks with the light up dog collar. The latest in pet safety innovation, the collar sports several heavy duty LED lights that illuminate the collar from within – ensuring your pet stays visible in the dead of night.

Dominate the battlefield by using the FPS gaming sight attachment to help you become the undisputed frag leader. The attachment is compatible with all the major gaming consoles and serves to improve your accuracy while shooting faster, as if you were an aimbot.

Cowabunga dude! The Ninja Turtles 3D nightlights are dropping by to make sure your kid sleeps safe and sound. Each of the four turtles gives off a healthy radioactive like glow that creates great ambient lighting while keeping the Shredder and his goons at bay.

Experience the up close encounter you’ve always been too afraid to try in real life with the shark wall projector. The projector easily mounts onto the wall and creates a jaw dropping image of a great white you can actually touch without losing a limb.

Quit scraping the ice off your car like a savage and step into the 21st century with the windshield heater-defroster. The heater conveniently plugs into your car and acts like a blow dryer to quickly and efficiently defrost your car’s windshield.

Take your favorite flame cooked desert from the open flame of a camp fire to the comfort of your home grill with the s’mores roasting rack. This ultra practical stainless steel rack makes it possible to cook several s’mores simultaneously in just one easy step.

Look out – there’s a great white shark in the water! Well – in the glass of water. The glass features a 3D glass design depicting a great white coming out of the water in full force, ready to devour whoever dares to drink from the glass.

Channel the Force in order to bake some of the most delicious treats in the galaxy with the Star Wars cookbook. With this unique cookbook in your capable hands, you’ll be able to uncover some of the galaxies best kept recipes, like Wookie cookies and Yoda soda.

Become a regular Casanova after you hit the town wearing some Stan Lee cologne. If there’s one thing the ladies love, it’s comic geeks that smell like the 90-something godfather of superhero comics. It’s the designer fragrance as distinguished as the legendary man himself.

Make tea time a little sweeter by using the cupcake tea kettle. This adorable little tea kettle has superb heat resistance and comes with an enamel coating on both the outside and inside of the tea kettle for durability, but the cherry on top is its adorably festive design.

Now you can get quality gaming time while on the go with the iPhone gaming controller powershell. This nifty attachment turns your plain old iPhone into a controller while also extending battery life so you can play comfortably for extended periods of time.

With the cardio exercise game app you’ll be able to turn your grueling workout into a fun interactive game that’ll make the time go by in a snap. The handle bars of your stationary bike become controllers you use to guide your player through various obstacles.

With the tattoo coloring book you can see if you’ve got what it takes to drop everything and open up a successful shop. The book features dozens of amazing drawings, all waiting for the next artist to make them come to life as they get colored in.

Make sure you never miss a beat by having the drum set stand for your tablet right next to you as you jam out. The stand allows you to position your tablet where you need it most, so you can always have the notes at hand – or watching <del>porn</del>viral videos in between songs.

Expand your culinary horizon as you utilize the ravioli rolling pin to add master pasta maker to your repertoire. This unique beechwood rolling pin measures 24″ wide and comes outfitted with specially made ridges designed to create perfect raviolis.

Amuse your feline companion by turning them into tiny pilots using the cardboard plane cat playhouse. The well designed plane comes with easy to follow instructions and is printed on nontoxic ink so if your pet turns into Catzilla they won’t get a tummy ache from eating it.

Power down after a long day in the geekiest way possible with the Star Wars C-3PO onesie. This snuggly double printed hoodie turns you into the quirky C-3PO while keeping you warm throughout cold winter nights so you won’t have to sleep inside a tauntaun.

Piss on the faces of your friends, family, and loved ones with the toilet targets protector. The targets are easy to install and are designed to encase a picture of your choosing in a waterproof bubble so that you can take aim and empty the entire tank.

With the strap-on roller skates you can go from skating down the street to walking straight into the office without having to ever change shoes. The skates adjust to fit various sizes and straps on in no time at all – it’s all the fun of skating without any of the hassles.

No matter what make or model, the Carma Sutra handbook will show you how to fog up the windshield in thrilling new positions you never thought possible. It’s the perfect combination of ancient sexual wisdom mixed with modern automotive know-how.

Make your birthday one to remember with the Doctor Who Dalek cake mold. The mold enables you to whip up some intricately shaped Dalek cakes any Doctor Who fan would drool over. Just the sight of this tasty cake is enough to make you want to exterminate it in one sitting.

titleEN: Cat Hair Is Lonely People Glitter
content: Celebrate your crippling loneliness with this funny because it’s true “cat hair is lonely people glitter” shirt. This hilarious novelty t-shirt boasts a simplistic kitty cat design along with a comical statement that is sure to resonate with any lonely owner of multiple cats.

Experience the unmatched freshness only magical fecal matter can provide when you shower with the unicorn poop soap. The surface of this vegan friendly bar of multicolored soap glitters and entices the nasal passages with scents like butterscotch and vanilla.

The tic-tac-toe shot game is the only version of this classic game that will never end in a frustrating draw. Each player gets the chance to drink up to 5 shots a game so whether the round produces a clear winner or not, you’ll be too drunk to care about the outcome.

Watch your productivity decrease as the super precision gyroscope hypnotizes you with its gravity defying splendor. The gyroscope is crafted to the highest precision from a light weight aluminum frame and features an electric motor that keeps it in motion for up to 7 mins.

Make breakfast the tastiest meal of the day when you make the ultimate omelette using the microwave omelette maker. The specially designed plastic container allows you to make delicious and hearty omelettes in mere minutes for the ultimate healthy breakfast.

Don’t fret if you lost your house in foreclosure – your whole family can live comfortably on the streets with this family size sleeping bag! No matter how cold and depressing the nights may get, you’ll always have each other to keep everyone warm and away from the bottle.

Avoid confusing your toothbrush with that of a roommate or family member when you start brushing with the black toothbrush. This edgy toothbrush blazes the trail with an all black design complimented by a matte finish and jet black bristles.

Everything you know is a lie. Now you can make your salads pop – even if they’re not very tasty – by incorporating some purple carrots into the mix. These stunningly vibrant carrots contain a vibrant purple exterior complimented by a deep orange flesh rich in anti-oxidants and vitamins.

Liven up game night with LEGO Pictionary. In this creative game, rather than explaining the word with a drawing – you explain it by building small sculptures using LEGO bricks. It’s fun for the whole family as everyone’s imagination and building skills get put to the test.

Prepare the best moonshine cocktails this side of the Mississippi with the mason jar shaker. This quality southern style shaker features a 3 piece stainless steel lid combined with a 32 oz. glass mason jar that creates a vintage look that’ll add personality to any home bar.

Achieve total nirvana every time you drop off the Browns at the Super Bowl with training from the Kama Pootra book. This informative book displays page after page of creative and sometimes challenging positions designed to improve your poops.

Cook your greasy and delicious strips of bacon to crispy perfection using the pig bacon press. This heavy cast iron bacon press features a sturdy wooden handle and comes shaped like a chubby little piggy who loves to help you keep his fallen comrades flat so they cook evenly.

Share the good times by sharing some good tunes with some friends using the branch headphone splitter. The ingenious design of the splitter gives you the ability to link several branches together, allowing you the option to expand your listening party.

Maximize your cars limited storage space with the tactical car seat cover. Apart providing your car with some chic urban-styled decorum, it protects your cars upholstery from stains and features a plethora a differently sized compartments great for storage.

Carry the exact tools you need to perform the task at hand with the modular pocket knife.  The pocket knife’s design allows the user to easily switch between twelve different interchangeable attachments so the right tool is always available when needed.

Unleash your little tike’s imagination by using the bird wings to transform them into a magical creature. Apart from their vibrant colors and whimsical designs, the winds feature comfortable shoulder straps and finger loops designed to help your kid spread their wings.

Get in touch with your inner crustacean when you slip on a pair of giant lobster claws. Who needs things like fingers and opposable thumbs when you can trade that all in for a pair of gnarly 14 1/2″ silicone pincers great for clawing stuff and making you look awesome in general.

Recreate your favorite action-packed, pizza-filled adventures with the LEGO Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. With an elaborate sewer compound, Foot soldier, and accessories that includes a skateboard for sewer surfing, the good times are just getting started.

Burn the melting cat skeleton candle and unleash the fiery, wild beast that lives inside. Once burned, this unique candle leaves you with a peculiar keepsake for your room – a kick-ass metallic feline skeleton rather than a dried up pile of melted wax.

Save your trunk from total anarchy and chaos by keeping everything in place with the trunk divider. This handy device is made from durable plastic, includes handles for easy maneuvering, and acts as a barrier to keep everyday items like groceries from spilling over while driving.

Keep every tie in your vast collection perfectly organized and always at hand with the motorized tie rack. This tie rack takes up minimal space in the closet yet has the capacity to organize up to 72 ties and 8 belts which you can control with a simple 2 button system.

Kick it old school by protecting your precious phone using the Sega Genesis iPhone case. This retro case slides on quick and easy to provide some SEGA styled protection from scratches and falls while allowing full access to the touch screen.

Maximize your workout <del>while looking like a serial killer</del> with the elevation training mask. Training with the mask simulates the conditions of high altitudes, creating pulmonary resistance that strengthens your diaphragm, ultimately increasing your stamina and lung capacity.

The remote control robotic ball is the high-tech toy that will revolutionize the way you play with yourself. It features free downloadable games and can be controlled through your smartphone so that you’ll never have to physically move or exert yourself in any way <del>you lazy bastard</del>.

Shovel your driveway in record time with the wheeled snow shovel. Thanks to a sturdy wheel built into the frame, you’ll be able to scoop up large amounts of snow with minimal effort, and greater efficiency than a noisy and clunky snow blower.

Monitor your level of inebriation by popping open each brew using the beer tracking bottle opener. With each opened bottle, a helpful screen on the front displays the number of beers you’ve opened, allowing you to assess your raging alcoholism with accuracy.

Commemorate the original version of the Star Wars film like a true fan with the Han shot first bookends. These expertly crafted bookends depict the iconic showdown between Han and Greedo at Mos Eisley wherein Han shoots Greedo before he fires off a shot.

Keep all the windows in your humble abode looking crystal clear all year round with the window cleaning robot. This handy appliance can be controlled by remote and will leave windows so spotless you’ll be bumping into them after the first wash.

The real rock key proves that the best hiding places often lie in plain sight. Each rock is hand selected and then drilled on the inside to create a small hollow compartment that is big enough to house an emergency key and complimented with a rubber lid to keep it air tight.

titleEN: I Will Not Be Your Father Condoms
content: Protect your rock hard lightsaber from the the dark side of sexual intercourse with the “I will not be your father” condoms. Just look at what happened to Anakin – he failed to use protection – couldn’t handle the responsibility, and became Darth Vader. Don’t be that guy.

Improve your overall riding experience with the revolutionary heads up display motorcycle helmet. The HUD helmet will enhance your commute with built-in features such as GPS, voice activated controls, and other amazing capabilities similar to Google Glass.

Welcome incoming guests in a polite and fashionable manner with the Keep Calm door mat. This stylish crimson doormat features a rubber back for added grip and stability while the reference to the British WWII slogan welcomes visitors in a humorous way.

Unleash your artistic talents on the world once you grab a hold of the graphite skull pencil. This custom designed pencil comes shaped like an ominous looking skull that measures 2.5″ in length and is made entirely out of graphite so it can be used right down to the end.

Invade your sketch pad and coloring book with the vibrant hues provided by the Space Invader crayons. These retro and novel crayons are shaped like the 8-bit aliens of the classic Space Invaders game. The tiny squad of 8 colorful aliens will transform your creation.

With the finger grip umbrella you’ll be able to maintain a firm grip as you text and update your status about the horrible weather. The ergonomic handle features a bold design that improves grip so your umbrella doesn’t accidentally fly away during windy conditions.

Cure a bad case of sour grapes and turn a frown upside down when you administer the emergency clown nose on your patient. Once you open the small plastic container, you’ll have the amazing healing power of laughter at your disposal.

Ensure you feast like a king while on the open road with the portable road trip grill. This culinary command station sets up in a flash and provides an impressive  285 square inches of cooking space – this way you’ll be able to grill everyone’s meal at once.

Bond with your siblings and parents through one of the many uneasy moments displayed by the Awkward Family Photos book. Based on the hilarious hit website, the book displays page after page of “unique” families immortalizing their awkwardness for the world to see.

Enjoy the fun of winter year round with glow in the dark snow. With just a little water, the snow expands to 10 times its size and glows in the dark when the lights go out. The snow is reusable, completely safe to play with, and won’t leave your hands cold after contact.

Good news Simpsons fans, Kent Brockman just reported that the Simpsons LEGO set is coming to a Springfield near you. The set includes everything you need to recreate the famous home at 742 Evergreen Terrace and your favorite neighbor-ino, Ned Flanders.

Garnish your meals with a little love by topping them off using the heart shaped egg mold. Now chefs of every skill level will be able to add a small yet heartfelt romantic touch with a few tasty hearts as part of your latest culinary masterpiece.

When important documents or classified S.H.I.E.L.D. documents need saving, enlist help from the gods by saving them on the Thor’s Hammer USB drive. While in possession of Thor’s Hammer, you’ll have unlimited power in addition to 8 GB at your disposal.

Indulge in a tender little White Castle burger whenever the craving strikes by lighting up the White Castle scented candle. The candle – styled like the classic White Castle slider box – smells exactly like those little and savory burgers steam grilled on a bed of onions.

Add a little twist – or shall we say swirl – to your furry friend’s meals with the slow feed dog bowl. The bowl’s whimsical spiral pattern creates a fun challenge for your pet while helping to reduce bloating, obesity, and regurgitation by forcing the dog to eat slowly.

Take social media’s interactivity up a notch with the Facebook like shot glasses. Every time the shot is full of hearty liquor, a Facebook ‘Like’ thumb gives you the much sought after sign of encouragement we all look for after posting a new pic or witty comment.

Create your own Jurassic bedroom with the dinosaur projecting wall lamp! Offering the stunning visuals of a land before time, the dinosaur projecting wall lamp with its special effects – such as sun ray light and jungle sound – will have your kids in awe.

Transform your boring old hand into a wacky and friendly creature with the monster hand temporary tattoos. These zany tattoos offers up to eight vibrant monsters waiting to be unleashed to entertain your easily amused children for hours on end.
